articles.title: Russia's Wagner group claims control of Bakhmut, but Kyiv says fighting continues - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Heavy fighting was continuing in the city, Ukrainian Deputy Defense Minister Hanna Maliar said.
articles.content: Russias Wagner paramilitary group claimed on Saturday to have gained control of Bakhmut, the eastern Ukrainian city that has seen the fiercest battles recently in Moscow’s war on Ukraine, but Kyiv di… [+2334 chars]

articles.title: Russia: Giving F-16 fighter jets to Ukraine a ‘colossal risk’ - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Western nations ‘still adhering to escalation scenario’ that risks widening the Ukraine war in Europe, official says.
articles.content:
Western countries will be running colossal risks if they supply Ukraine with F-16 fighter jets, a Russian official says.
